Metro Area Sr. Financial Analyst, Strategy & Analysis The Washington Post August 2011  –  December 2013  (2 years 5 months) Washington D.C. Metro Area • Participated in quantitative and qualitative analyses for the evaluation and implementation of key strategic initiatives focused on revenue generation, cost reduction, and improving the long-term sustainability and viability of The Washington Post. Specific projects include the rollout of a new iPad application, an online video franchise, subscription model for washingtonpost.com, cost driver identification and tracking, and customer life-time valuation. 
 
• Develop strategic recommendations and insights through data analysis, financial modeling, and collaboration with functional area experts to identify historic trends and generate hypotheses for the future behavior of key metrics that provide guidance on performance of key strategic initiatives. 
 
• Develop and present ad hoc/standard financial and operational reporting to Senior Level executives, optimized to provide insights and enhance decision-making. 
 
• Participated in the annual budgeting and forecasting processes as well as monthly and quarterly variance analyses.
